app.refreshPrompt: Please refresh the page in time to update, to avoid affecting usage

crud.batchActionConfirm: Are you sure you want to execute {action}?
crud.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
crud.deleteWarning: Deletion cannot be undone, please proceed with caution
crud.warnBatchDeleteRequestDeleteByRecords: requestDeleteByRecords is required when actions includes batch_delete
crud.warnCreateDetailForm: detailForm is required when actions includes create
crud.warnCreateRequestCreateByValues: requestCreateByValues is required when actions includes create
crud.warnDeleteProps: deleteProps and requestDeleteByRecord are required when actions includes delete
crud.warnReadDetailForm: detailForm is required when actions includes read
crud.warnReadRequestGetByRecord: requestGetByRecord is required when actions includes read
crud.warnUpdateDetailForm: detailForm is required when actions includes update
crud.warnUpdateRequest: requestGetByRecord and requestUpdateByValues are required when actions includes update

crudOfList.warnAtLeastOneSearch: At least one column with search set to true is required in CRUDOfList columns
crudOfList.warnOnlyOneSearch: Only one column with search set to true is allowed in CRUDOfList columns

upload.dragUpload: Click or drag files to this area to upload
upload.maxFilesWarning: A maximum of {count} file(s) can be uploaded, the excess will be ignored.
